metadata.Plot: Three play-authors, Horace Dryden, Nick Milburn and "Babe" Lawton, are in an apartment seeking a plot for a new play. They are still on Page 1 when an intoxicated man wanders into their room, collapses and they, looking for identification, find $15,000 in his pockets. On the assumption that me might be a blackmailer, the three decide to build a scenario around him. Things become a bit more involved when the man is later found to be murdered.
metadata.Writer: Frederic Dannay, Manfred Lee, Lowell Brentano
metadata.Actors: Lew Ayres, Ruth Coleman, Eugene Pallette
